meanings.definition: A category or class of things with similar characteristics.
meanings.sent1: There are many different sorts of animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: She organized her books into different sorts based on genre.
meanings.sent3: The sorts of ice cream flavors they had were truly endless.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trees stood tall like different sorts of soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the sorts of shapes using colorful examples.

meanings.definition: To arrange or classify items into groups.
meanings.sent1: She sorts her socks by color before putting them away.
meanings.sent2: He helps to sort the recycling into different bins.
meanings.sent3: The robot sorted the toys into neat piles with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her mind started to sort through memories like a busy librarian.
meanings.sent5: The students were asked to sort the shapes into two separate groups.

meanings.definition: To find out the nature of something.
meanings.sent1: He sorts through the evidence to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: She carefully sorted the ingredients to make sure nothing was missing.
meanings.sent3: The detective sorted through the clues to crack the case.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like puzzle pieces, trying to sort out the truth.
meanings.sent5: The scientist sorted the samples to identify the different elements.
